channel.title: Every time i attack an npc
channel.description:
every time i attack an npc it takes about 10 seconds to attack it and after the first time i hit it, it takes another 10 seconds to hit it again. The npc wont even attack me. I'm not good with java, in fact I'm still looking for someone to code for me.
anyways, can anyone help me please?
and if you are interested for coding for me ill be happy to give an admin spot.

item.title: Every time i attack an npc
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

how in the hell do i do that??? i told you im not good with java lol

Read full topic
